# Sample R code

Here is some R code that DOES execute

```{r,  fig.height = 5, fig.width = 13, dpi = 300, echo = FALSE}
starwars %>% 
  filter(mass < 500) %>% 
  mutate(species = replace_na(species, "No Species")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = height, y = mass, color = species)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2) + 
  labs(color = NULL)
```
